code: import React,{useEffect,useState}from"react";import{useNavigate}from"react-router-dom";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";export default function Home(){const navigate=useNavigate();const[items,setItems]=useState([]);const[form,setForm]=useState({name:"",quantity:"",description:""});const[editingId,setEditingId]=useState(null);const[loading,setLoading]=useState(true);useEffect(()=>{const token=localStorage.getItem("token");if(!token){navigate("/login");}else{fetchItems();}},[navigate]);const fetchItems=async()=>{try{const res=await fetch("http://localhost:5000/inventory");const handleChange=e=>{setForm({...form,[e.target.name]:e.target.value});};const handleSubmit=async e=>{e.preventDefault();const method=editingId?"PUT":"POST";const fetch(url,{method,headers:{"Content-Type":"application/json"},body:JSON.stringify(form)});setForm({name:"",quantity:"",description:""});setEditingId(null);fetchItems();}catch(err){console.error("Error saving item:",err);}};const handleEdit=item=>{setForm({name:item.name,quantity:item.quantity,description:item.description});setEditingId(item._id);};const handleDelete=async id=>{try{await fetch(`http://localhost:5000/inventory/${id}`,{method:"DELETE"});fetchItems();}catch(err){console.error("Error deleting item:",err);}};const handleLogout=()=>{localStorage.removeItem("token");navigate("/");};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{style:{padding:"20px",maxWidth:"700px",margin:"auto"},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"Inventory Item":"Add New Item"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{onSubmit:handleSubmit,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",name:"name",placeholder:"Item Name",value:form.name,onChange:handleChange,required:true,style:{marginRight:"10px",width:"30%"}}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"number",name:"quantity",placeholder:"Quantity",value:form.quantity,onChange:handleChange,required:true,min:1,style:{marginRight:"10px",width:"20%"}}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",name:"description",placeholder:"Description",value:form.description,onChange:handleChange,style:{marginRight:"10px",width:"30%"}}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"submit",children:editingId?"Update":"Add"})]})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("section",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Items"}),loading?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"Loading ",item.description,/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>handleEdit(item),style:{marginLeft:"10px"},children:"Edit"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>handleDelete(item._id),style:{marginLeft:"5px"},children:"Delete"})]},item._id))}):/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"No inventory items found."})]})]});}
